translate.title: Sign Translate
translate.description: Effortless Real-Time Sign Language Translation. Translate Sign Language instantly on desktop and mobile.

hero.title: Translate between 40+ signed and spoken languages in real-time.
hero.img: Example of live translation between American Sign Language and English

direction.spoken-to-signed: Translate from spoken to signed languages
direction.signed-to-spoken: Or from signed to spoken languages

real-time.title: Real-Time Translation
real-time.subtitle: Translate between 40+ signed and spoken languages in real-time
real-time.description: Our app allows you to communicate naturally and easily with anyone, anywhere, anytime, in your own sign language.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.subtitle: Translate between different sign languages and spoken languages
multilingual.description: Our app supports multiple sign languages and spoken languages, so you can communicate with people from different countries and cultures.

appearance.title: Customizable Appearance
appearance.subtitle: Our photo realistic sign language avatars offer a wide range of customization options to suit your specific needs.
appearance.description: Whether you want to create an avatar that looks like you or create a unique character, our customization options allow you to express yourself in a way that feels authentic and true to you.

open-source.title: Open Source Project
open-source.subtitle: Sign Translate is an open-source project, allowing the community to contribute and enhance its features.
open-source.description: By sharing our source code, we aim to foster collaboration and transparency. Your feedback and contributions are welcome as we strive to improve and expand the app's capabilities

offline.title: Offline Functionality
offline.subtitle: Sign Translate work everywhere, even offline on an airplane.
offline.description: Whether you're traveling, in a remote area, or without internet, our app ensures you can always translate spoken or written language into sign language, keeping essential communication tools at your fingertips.

404.title: Page not found
404.doesNotExist: Sorry, the page you were looking for doesn't exist.
404.errorLogged: We've logged the error and will look into it.

text-to-speech.unavailable: Voice output isn't available for the selected language

speech-to-text.service-not-allowed: Need permission to use speech recognition
speech-to-text.browser-not-supported: Voice input isn't supported on this browser
